column1: '''Hyarrostar''' was the wide promontory that spread out to the south and east of [[Númenor]]
column2: and in fact contained its easternmost point.<ref>{{UT|NMap}}</ref> Along its southern shores were wide beaches of white sands
column4: where the shorelands were interrupted by the mouths of the River [[Siril]]
column5: stood the township of [[Nindamos]]. The Hyarrostar was most famous for its trees
column6: and it held great plantations that provided much of the wood used by Númenor's shipwrights.<ref>{{UT|Numenor}}</ref>
